subject: Greetings!!!
body:
Greetings!!!
My name is Sgt. Janet Stone. US Military, Serving here in Syria presently
I am here to negotiate with you on a possible transfer of $20 Million USD to you for safe -keeps and Investments. I made the money from an oil business I did in Syria with a Syrian citizen. I need a good partner who I can trust to assist me in receiving the consignment on my behalf.
All arrangements to bring out the consignment from Syria have been concluded with a United Nations Diplomat. I need someone who can receive it since I cannot receive it directly due to my status.
I am offering you 20% of the total sum for your assistance and the 80% will be kept in a safe place till I come over to you.
Your own part of this deal is to find a safe place where the funds can be sent to.
If you are interested I will furnish you with more details. But the whole process is simple and we must keep a low profile at all times. The best mode of communication to me is through email.
I look forward to your reply and cooperation, and I thank you in advance as I anticipate your cooperation waiting for your urgent response.
Thanks for your understanding.
So email me via 
msforcestone76@aol.com
 or 
msforce.nursestone@gmail.com
 to explain more details to you.
Respectfully,
Sgt. Janet Stone.
United States Army: Syria

subject: Re: Greetings!!!
body:
Hello Sgt. Janet Stone,

It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Your message is quite intriguing, I must say. It sounds like you're in a challenging situation over there in Syria.

I'm curious about this oil business you mentioned. How did you get involved in it? And how did it lead to such a large sum of money?

Also, could you please elaborate on the role of the United Nations Diplomat in this process? It's fascinating to hear about their involvement.

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Urgent Response from Sgt. Janet
body:
Good day

I am encouraged that you are willing to assist me and I am very grateful and thankful for your care.
The details of the transaction

I'm Janet Stone From the USA , I am presently in Syria . I acquired $20 Million USD from the contract I did with the United Nations Oil for food program here in Syria, now my government is against all such contracts done by any military officer while serving in Syria and is setting up a panel of investigation to confiscate funds resulting from all contracts done by any military officer . I need to know you well and trust you to assist me in receiving this fund outside Syria which is presently filled in a consignment in a security and finance company as family treasure.
All arrangements to bring out the consignment from Syria has been concluded with a United Nations Diplomat. All I want you to do is to receive the fund since I cannot receive it directly due to my status and duty. I am offering you 20% of the total sum for your assistance and the remaining will be kept in a safe place till I come over to you . Your own part of this deal is to find a safe place where the funds can be sent to.

  I will furnish you with more details. But the whole process is simple and we must keep a low profile at all times.


However, before we go any further I would like to know more about you. In order for us to build a trusting business relationship I would like us to correspond a bit first. I would like to know what you do for a living. Are you married? Do you have any children? Anything else that you would like to tell me about yourself would be greatly appreciated.
I believe that in life building a trusting relationship is the most important thing. If we are able to build this kind of relationship then we will be able to do business together without any misunderstandings or miss dealings. In your next mail, please provide me with Your Full Name, Passport Scan Copy or ID Card, Home or Office Address, Your Occupation, Your Date of Birth, Your Country of Origin and Contact Phone Number. I will send you a copy of an agreement That will bind our business relationship together. I need this personal information to be able to entrust you with the responsibility of representing my interest. I don’t  have access to the phone here due to security reasons and we are all monitored by the US Government.
I look forward to hearing from you soon. Thanks for your understanding.
Regard,
Sgt. Janet Stone.

subject: Re: Urgent Response from Sgt. Janet
body:
Hello Sgt. Janet Stone,

It's a pleasure to meet you, and I'm quite intrigued by your story. It must be challenging being in Syria right now, especially with the situation you've described. I appreciate your trust in me and I'm willing to help in any way that I can.

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide more information about this process? For instance, how did you manage to secure such a large sum of money from the United Nations Oil for food program? Also, why is it necessary for the funds to be moved out of Syria?

I understand that due to security reasons you cannot use a phone but is there any other way we can verify this transaction? Maybe through an official channel or a third party?

As for me, well, I lead a simple life. I am not married and don't have any children. My work involves managing a small grocery store in my town. It's not much but it keeps me busy and helps pay the bills.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Project
body:
Hi

How are you doing today? Hope all is well with you.
I want you to know that I have completely made up my heart to entrust all funds under your care, note that I packaged all funds inside a locked boxes before depositing it with Expert Diplomatic Company in Turkey, for safekeeping and when depositing the box I registered the content of the boxes as family valuable treasure items for security of the funds inside the boxes ,no staff of the delivery company knows the real content as money.


Thank you so much for the information my good friend, I cannot wait to meet you if I am still alive when this transaction is concluded. I want to clarify one doubt from you that this transaction is 100% legal. I understand you may be skeptical but please you must really have to help me secure the money and in case anything happens to me here in the war zone, then I advise you to distribute my share of the fund to the charity homes for their continuous prayer upon my life. I would also like you to build a hospital for the poor which will be in my name as well.

I will proceed immediately to prepare the delivery of the boxes to you as my rightful partner for handing over our boxes to you on my behalf, then the diplomat will make the delivery to you as diplomatic luggage so this allows free entry inside your country without screening at the airports. My dear, I would have loved to call you for more discussions but we are not using personal mobile phones and all the telephones we have here are available operators that monitor incoming and outgoing calls , so I will not like to communicate with you on it for now because I want our transaction to be confidential.

Have in mind that I have made up my mind to give you 20% of the fund for your assistance and support in this deal. I really understand what it takes to accumulate such huge amount of funds under your care, for this reason, I am willing to share it equal as I am not a greedy person and hence my dad and mom are dead and am the only child.so as it stands right now you represent my prospect partner because this deal is what we do together but please make sure that my share is well secured until I complete my service here and come over to meet with you.

Know that I am free with you because I have trusted you with all my heart in this deal. So please do not let me down. You may not understand why I am doing this but I know even if I passed away, your prayer and the prayer of the orphanage will secure me a place in paradise.

And remember they don't know the content of the safe boxes except me and you. It's a top secret.


Here is the Delivery Company Details to contact them now

ATLANTIC DIPLOMATIC COMPANY TURKEY
Address : Embassy Diplomatic Section
Email : Atlanticdiplomatic@diplomats.com
Website : www.atlanticsecuritycompany.com
Operational Manager : Mr. Robert Belto

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, your story is quite intriguing and it's clear that you're going through a lot right now. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult circumstances you're facing.

I appreciate your trust in me, but I have a few questions if you don't mind. You mentioned that the funds are currently in Turkey, how did they end up there? Also, could you please explain more about the process of delivering these boxes as diplomatic luggage?

Furthermore, I'm curious about the Atlantic Diplomatic Company in Turkey. Could you tell me more about their services and how they operate? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello there,

Wow, your story is quite intriguing! It sounds like you've been through a lot. I'm curious about the oil business in Syria. How did you get involved in it? And how did you manage to secure such a large contract with the United Nations Oil for food program?

I'm also interested in knowing more about this United Nations Diplomat who helped you conclude all arrangements to bring out the fund from Syria. Can you tell me more about him or her?

As for receiving the fund on your behalf, I'd love to help but I need to understand more about the process. Could you explain how that would work? And what kind of safe place are we talking about here? A bank, perhaps?

Your plan to distribute part of the fund to charity homes and build a hospital for the poor is truly commendable. It's great that even amidst all this, you're thinking of helping others.

Looking forward to hearing more from you soon!

Best wishes,
Debra

subject: Project
body: I have explained everything you need to know so if you are willing and ready to help me receive the funds just email the delivery company now and tell them you are a good friend to me and you want to receive my family treasure safe boxes because I'm on a tour duty mission here in the Syria and that you are a good friend to me. They don't know the safe boxes contains money except me and you because they are locked with code and I'm the only one with the code.

body:
Hello there,

Wow, your story is quite intriguing! It sounds like you've been through a lot. I'm really interested in learning more about this situation. You mentioned an oil business in Syria and a contract with the United Nations Oil for food program. That sounds fascinating! Could you tell me more about how that works? 

Also, I'm curious about the process of moving funds out of Syria. How does that work exactly? And why can't you receive the funds directly due to your status?

subject: Re: Project
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation. It sounds like a very important mission you're on in Syria, and I appreciate your trust in me. 

I'm curious about the delivery company you mentioned. Could you tell me more about them? What's their name? How long have they been in business? And how did you come to choose them for this task?

Also, could you provide more details about these safe boxes? What are their dimensions and weight? Are there any special handling instructions that I should be aware of?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

body:
